metadata.name: HYPERSPACE // 1/10
metadata.description:
This token entitles you to:

- Access to the Hyperpunk creator's discord channel
- Access to the private Hi Vis discord
- A vote in community proposals
- A piece of art
- Early access to the Hyperpunk // EP
- Invites and tickets to all Hyperpunk // events both online and offline
- Your own personal guestlist for events
- Profile at the top of the Hi Vis website
- Merchandise and an NFT wearable airdrop
